channel.title: CVE Feed for By Averta -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for By Averta -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37888|2024-08-02T17:23:27.670Z -- by%20averta -- shortcodes%20and%20extra%20features%20for%20phlox%20theme
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in By Averta Shortcodes and extra features for Phlox theme allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Shortcodes and extra features for Phlox theme: from n/a through 2.14.0.
